channel.title: We Ate It Anyway
channel.description: Recent content on We Ate It Anyway

item.title: Dinner Rolls
item.description: Last night we had collard greens with bacon and goat cheese for dinner, with these awesome dinner rolls on the side. Surprisingly, the recipe calls for no eggs, oils or butter. Here is a link to the recipe - the dough is very sticky, but comes out dense and fluffy, like a biscuit. Be careful about how much salt you add. Next time we have these, I want to try adding shredded cheddar to the dough.

item.title: About
item.description: This blog is a collection of recipes, tips & tricks we come across as we practice lazy keto, the art of low carb cooking without looking too hard at the macros. üçñ

item.title: First post: baked brie
item.description: Hey, it’s baked brie. Here’s how to make it: Slice the top off of a wheel of brie Sandwich marionberries in between the brie Wrap the whole thing in fathead dough Brush with egg whites, and sprinkle sesame seeds on top Cut a couple of vents in the top We ate the whole thing over the course of the day. No need for dipping foods, just slice off a hunk.
